author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great
review: Cool design, cool parts! This set includes a lot of useful parts: suspension bridge, money, oars and much more! It were called "the goldsmugglers' hiding-place" (directly translated from Norwegian). It's one of the many great sets from 1996.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: One of the best!
review:
The smugglers hide-away had everything, Land Rover, twin engine plane, boat and building plus plenty of minifigs and animals.

$100 bills, bags full of coins and little brown packages. Keep an eye out for the cops.

Great set.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: I like the set.
review: The set is really cool, just yesterday I used the roof of the building in a costom design(based of of the rock raiders pc game that I am playing for the third time)My brother and I got a lot of fun out of this set which includes having "Robin Hood" (who somehow got our our time)  fly the airplane.We also used the pieces to make an island base. Grat set one of my first.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Leisure) - Gator Landing Review
review:
This is a fun set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 28 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has some very cool pieces. We get lot's of black & red pieces which are always great for future MOC's and/or brickfilms for sure.

Minifigures

This set has 3 cool looking minifigs: One of them has red pants, a red cap and a black jacket. The other one has blue pants, a green vest, black shades on his face, a gray hat and a yellow life jacket. The last figure has black pants, black hair, a brown jacket and black shades on his face.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/6563-1.jpg[/img]


This set has lot's of stuff in it: We get a jeep, a boat, a sea plane, a cabin and a gator. The mouth of the gator can be opened and closed and the tail can be adjusted very easily as well. The boat has a propeller on the back which is able to sviwel full 360°. On one side you can see a pickaxe and on the other side you can see an oar. On the back you can also see a place where you can put the suitcase.


The jeep has a door on each side which can be opened very easily as well. On the top is a ceiling which you can move up as well. The sea plane has a very nice design as well: The propeller on each side can sviwel full 360° and the cockpit can be opened very nice and easy as well.  On the back is a container where the pilot can store the money. The cabin is very cool as well: We get a door which you can open, a chair, a bridge and a ladder which can be adjusted, too.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

author: joel92
title: Great set, although maybe a bit shady
review:
One of my all time favorites.  This set had it all, including the awesome airplane and fan-boat.  I never really quite figured out the purpose of this set though.  My parents and I always dubbed it the "bayou drug runners" set.

This set will always hold a special place in my collection
